alert.note: Alert for Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay; Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island; Salisbury Sound to Cape Fairweather Coastal Area (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 08 at 10:50PM AKST until January 09 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 24 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph from the southeast. * WHERE...Juneau, Gustavus, Hoonah, Tenakee Springs, Pelican, and Elfin Cove. * WHEN...Until 9 PM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Winds could down trees and cause power outages. Heavy, wet snow will be difficult to manage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Ponding could develop after a changeover to rain on Sunday night for most areas, but in Juneau on Monday morning. In areas of deep snow pack, additional snow and a changeover to rain could challenge load bearing ability of roof- tops, planes, and boats. There is a chance of freezing rain before the change over.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay; Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island; Salisbury Sound to Cape Fairweather Coastal Area
